item.title: Empowering Active Learning for 3D Molecular Graphs with Geometric Graph Isomorphism
item.description: This study introduces a novel active learning paradigm for 3D molecular graphs, significantly improving efficiency and accuracy by leveraging geometric graph isomorphisms and distributional representa…
